author: Tony Tobin
method: For the vinaigrette, sweat the leek in a pan with the white wine, white wine vinegar and orange pepper for 5 minutes. For the chicken, season to taste with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Heat the olive oil in a pan, then add the chicken strips and cook, stirring, for 5 minutes or until cooked through. To serve, spoon the vinaigrette on to a plate, top with the chicken strips, then top with the slices of mozzarella.
ingredients: ½ leek, finely chopped,  50ml/2fl oz white wine,  1½ tbsp white wine vinegar,  ¼ orange pepper, finely chopped,  1 chicken breast, cut into strips,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  1 tbsp olive oil,  2 slices mozzarella cheese, to serve
